branchCategory.name: C(D)J2RKA-Z, Air Cylinder, Direct Mount, Non-rotating, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchCategory.description: <p>Direct Mount CJ2-Z double acting, non-rotating single rod, stainless steel tube, air cylinders are available in 10 and 16mm bore sizes with stroke lengths from 15mm to 200mm. Optional features include port location and magnet for auto-switch capability. Rod end brackets can be ordered with the cylinder under one part number.</p>
